segment.source: This topic shows you how to launch the compose SMS dialog to allow the user to send an SMS message.
segment.target: This topic shows you how to launch the compose SMS dialog to allow the user to send an SMS message.

segment.source: You can pre-populate the fields of the SMS with data before showing the dialog.
segment.target: You can pre-populate the fields of the SMS with data before showing the dialog.

segment.source: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.
segment.target: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.

segment.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive

segment.source: This topic shows you how to launch the compose SMS dialog to allow the user to send an SMS message.
segment.target: This topic shows you how to launch the compose SMS dialog to allow the user to send an SMS message.

segment.source: You can pre-populate the fields of the SMS with data before showing the dialog.
segment.target: You can pre-populate the fields of the SMS with data before showing the dialog.

segment.source: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.
segment.target: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.

segment.source: Create a new ChatMessage object and set the data that you want to be pre-populated in the compose email dialog.
segment.target: Create a new ChatMessage object and set the data that you want to be pre-populated in the compose email dialog.

segment.source: Call ShowComposeSmsMessageAsync to show the dialog.
segment.target: Call ShowComposeSmsMessageAsync to show the dialog.

segment.source: This topic has shown you how to launch the compose SMS dialog.
segment.target: This topic has shown you how to launch the compose SMS dialog.

segment.source: For information on selecting contacts to use as recipients for an SMS message, see Select contacts.
segment.target: For information on selecting contacts to use as recipients for an SMS message, see Select contacts.

segment.source: Download the Universal Windows app samples from GitHub to see more examples of how to send and receive SMS messages by using a background task.
segment.target: Download the Universal Windows app samples from GitHub to see more examples of how to send and receive SMS messages by using a background task.
